channel.title: linux on Daniel Wagner
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Daniel Wagner

item.title: ArchLinux on Azure
item.description: Currently I’m taking part in the preview of the Azure Compute Gallery - community galleries. As I’ve been a fan of the ArchLinux distribution for some years already, I took this opportuinty to start maintaning an ArchLinux image share to Azure community. If you’re interested just check for it under it’s name arch-linux by publisher danielwagn3r - which is me. Find more about the image in my recent post ArchLinux on Azure
